subject: Handle system-server notifications in wlmessage plugin
commitMessage:
Handle system-server notifications in wlmessage plugin

This is an implementation that gets system-server poweroff event type from bundle

Signed-off-by: Christophe Moreau <christophe.moreau@open.eurogiciel.org>
Change-Id: I2a2d37add6c2a9187191c7b1419ae71c35f64204

comments.message:
Patch Set 1: Code-Review-1

(3 comments)

Not sure about the vconf key and few comments.

Patch Set 3:

I'd prefer that you add a dependency on sysman and use sysman_call_predef_action(PREDEF_POWEROFF, 0) function.

If we do it like that we will have to extract code for every system-server component in order to be coherent.

This is my opinion.

I let Manuel decide on this.
